alert.note: Alert for Bay; Genesee; Midland; Saginaw; Shiawassee; Tuscola (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 3:44AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Tuscola, Bay, Saginaw, Shiawassee, Genesee and Midland Counties through 445 AM EDT... At 343 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Oil City to near DeWitt. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sanford around 350 AM EDT. Laingsburg and Freeland around 400 AM EDT. Midland and Perry around 405 AM EDT. Owosso, Auburn, Corunna and Morrice around 410 AM EDT. Bay City, Kawkawlin, Bancroft and Linwood around 415 AM EDT. Durand, Essexville, Byron, Lennon and Gaines around 420 AM EDT. Fenton, Swartz Creek, Linden and Quanicassee around 430 AM EDT. Akron and Lake Fenton around 435 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Rankin, Wisner, Fenmore, Buena Vista Township, Gera, Gilford and Indiantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
